charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] felt a menacing
aura one day while training in the mountains.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1101_0200:
When [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] headed toward it, it turned out to be
Giovanni.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_0400: With this power, Team Rocket can—
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_0402_0800:
Hmph. We’ve only just run into each other, yet you
have such a sour look on your face. You must hate
me.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_0900: I was just evaluating a new tool of mine.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1000:
And what I’ve learned is this creature has more
power than I imagined!
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1100:
Guzzlord is one of the UBs Team Rocket captured
here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1200: With its insatiable appetite, it’s constantly eating.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1300:
Its power to eat anything and everything should
prove useful to Team Rocket.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1400:
Think about it. Anything it devours disappears
without a trace.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1500:
Wouldn’t it be perfect for erasing evidence of my
schemes?
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1600:
Or perhaps I could feed it hideouts of rival
organizations that stand in my way.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1700: That’d be an easy way to limit their opposition.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_1800: Guzzlord is the ultimate tool for Team Rocket!
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_0301_1900: I won’t let you do that!
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_0401_2000: Guzzlord simply wants to sate its hunger.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_0401_2100: Isn’t caring for our Pokémon our duty as Trainers?
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_0402_2300:
In that case, why should Guzzlord—a living
creature—be denied its desires?
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_0402_2400:
If it’s not a tool, then perhaps we should let it do
what it wants.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_2500:
Now then, enough of this back and forth. I must
get going.
charaepi_ch0140_11_sakaki/2301_1201_2600:
I have much thinking to do. I must make plans to
use Guzzlord’s skills.
